text:
*Quick simple adjustment needed for customized quote template -* 

Hi - we have a default quote template in HubSpot that I need some help editing and applying a child theme to include CSS for a PRINTED PDF page break (NOT just the screen). I am stuck on how to implement the CSS and ensure it's connected appropriately within HubSpot. We are using the Flow theme, which I believe is a HubSpot default.

These links have been helpful but styling/HubSpot CMS is not my strength -

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Quote-Custom-template-break-page/m-p/414054>
<https://css-tricks.com/almanac/properties/p/page-break/>

I'm looking for a fairly quick turnaround on this, given that it's just one section at the end that needs a page break - we would love to be able to use it for quotes on Monday. Budget is ~$50 - feel free to send me a message and we can work through a Fiverr gig or another appropriate avenue.

Hi everyone! Greetings from :flag-pe:

I want to offer my services as a HubSpot developer :nerd_face:
I have also specializations in User Experience and Digital Marketing
I have led teams too, and got to help my clients to accomplish goals such as winning webs awards or getting a better SEO score..
Additional stacks: React, Laravel, Wordpress, Git, PHP, Javascript

Feel free to DM me :muscle: I'm ready for new challenges
